Firefox:
- Keybinder addon for <Ctrl-H/L>
- To disable zoom with scrollwheel for laptop:
    - about:config - mousewheel.with_control.action = 0

VSCode:
- To change background color of the status bar: Find workbench.main.css (/usr/share/code/resources/app/out/vs/workbench)
    - .monaco-shell .statusbar-item>.dropdown.send-feedback{display:inline-block}
        - Change display:inline-block to display:none
    - Or use vscode-custom-css

Zsh:
- Correctall will correct simple spelling mistakes for commands and options

General:
- Some public wifi hotspots don't like it when you uses https to login
